Control Name: Restores the Affected Environment—The activities restore the affected environment to functional operation by rebuilding systems, updating software, installing patches, and changing configurations, as needed.

control_attributes.Control: Restores the Affected Environment—The activities restore the affected environment to functional operation by rebuilding systems, updating software, installing patches, and changing configurations, as needed.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.5 The entity identifies, develops, and implements activities to recover from identified security incidents.
